title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla

sources.title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
sources.description: Entertainers Duke Mitchell and Sammy Petrillo parachute into the jungles of the Pacific island of Cola-Cola, where they meet primitive tribesmen, the chief's sarong-clad daughter Nona, and mad scientist Dr. Zabor (Bela Lugosi) conducting experiments in evolution. Jealous of Mitchell's relations with Nona, Zabor has just the thing to make a monkey of him...

sources.title: Suspense A Cask Of Amontillado ( Bela Lugosi)
sources.description: 1949 directed by Robert Stevens. Adaptation for television of Edgar Allen Poe's A Cask of Amontillado, set in post World-War Two Italy and starring Romney Brent as Montressor and Bela Lugosi as the doomed Fortunato. Poor Fortunato...he should have used Auto-Light.

sources.title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla (1952)
sources.description: The Singer Duke Mitchell meets Sammy Petrillo in this parody of Martin & Lewis. They arrive on a jungle island, where a mad scientist played by Bela Lugosi makes human experiments. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/bela-lugosi-meets-a-brooklyn-gorilla-1952/

sources.title: Bela Lugosi - Scared to Death (1946 Thriller) From beyond the grave: a ghostly murder mystery!
sources.description:
Laura met her end in a wave of terror.. now hear her morgue-side secrets!
Trapped in a mansion packed with suspicious characters, she navigates a maze of murder involving Lugosi‚Äôs hypnotist Prof. Leonide, his silent sidekick Indigo, and a mysterious figure in a glowing mask‚Äîrealizing her last dance with danger has far more players than she ever suspected.


‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING:
Bela Lugosi - Prof. Leonide
George Zucco - Dr. Joseph Van Ee
Nat Pendleton - Bill Raymond
Molly Lamont - Laura Van Ee / Laurette La Valle (narrator)
Joyce Compton - Jane Cornell
Gladys Blake - Lilybeth
Roland Varno - Ward Van Ee
Douglas Fowley - Terry Lee
Stanley Andrews - Pathologist
Angelo Rossitto - Indigo
Lee Bennett - Rene
Stanley Price - Autopsy Surgeon

Genres: Crime, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Release date: December 18, 1946
Filming location: Hollywood

sources.title: Bela Lugosi Meets A Brooklyn Gorilla
sources.description: This film has fallen in the Public Domain.

sources.title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla (1952) Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi
sources.description:
A horror film that will stiffen you with laughter!
Goofy entertainers Mitchell and Petrillo (Martin & Lewis clones) parachute into the jungles of the Pacific island of Cola-Cola, where they meet primitive tribesmen, the chief's sarong-clad daughter Nona, and mad scientist Dr. Zabor conducting experiments in evolution. Jealous of Mitchell's relations with Nona, Zabor has just the thing to make a monkey of him...

Original title: Brooklyn Gorilla (1952) 


Director: William Beaudine
Writers: Tim Ryan, Leo 'Ukie' Sherin, Edmond Seward
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Duke Mitchell, Sammy Petrillo 
Genres: Horror, SciFi, Comedy
Budget: $50,000

00:00 Full length movie.
00:07 Unlikely encounter in a wild and tropical setting leads to confusion and mistaken identities.
09:22 Entertaining performance by a character named Duke on a beautiful island.
15:43 A queen-to-be in a dilemma seeks help from a scientist on an island for survival.
22:15 Doctor Zabor meets Duke Mitchell and Sammy Petrillo in a spooky place, discussing a mysterious man and a plane crash.
28:43 Unexpected meeting with a gorilla leads to a playful interaction with friends and a police officer.
35:36 Mysterious interactions in a cage between characters, including singing and dancing under the moonlight.
47:36 A comedic encounter involves a man turning into a gorilla, leading to unexpected situations.
57:03 A gorilla named Limpi√≥ tries to communicate with the characters using gestures and charades.
1:09:40 Bela Lugosi encounters a transformed individual in a comedic, horror, and sci-fi setting.
